attributes.additional_details: This is a petition to try and save RAF Leuchars. My dad was in the RAF and weve been at leuchars for a while and i feel we can be stuck in scotland with one RAF base, if the government is trying to make cuts close one down in england as there are far more. If this base closes i think the local enconomy my fall as the air show brings in thousands each year also we protection and lossy cant provide us with this protection.
